Package it.polimi.ingsw.GUI

Class AllCardsMenuController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.GUI.AllCardsMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AllCardsMenuController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for the AllCards stage that will be diplayed when the challenger has to choose the available cards for each players.

    • setMainController

      public static void setMainController​(MainController mc)

    • handleSelect

      public void handleSelect​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method triggered by a MouseClick over a card. The "selected" attribute becomes the God value and then two buttons (Add or Remove) will be displayed to add the card or remove from deck.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • handleAdd

      public void handleAdd()
      Triggered by a MouseClick over 'Add' button. Adds the selected God to 'added' ArrayList. When the size of such list becomes equal to the number of players the stage will show a confirm button to send the choosen deck.

    • handleConfirm

      public void handleConfirm()
      MainController will notify a PlayerDeckMessage where the deck represents the choosen cards.
